name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher, Appellee, v. GREATER MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL, INC. and Gerald Payne, Betty Payne, Don Hall, Brenda Hall, Jim List, Patrick Henry Talbert, a/k/a Patrick Henry Talbot a/k/a Patrick Henry, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Greater Ministries International, Inc.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher, Appellee, v. GREATER MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL, INC. and Gerald Payne, Betty Payne, Don Hall, Brenda Hall, Jim List, Patrick Henry Talbert, a/k/a Patrick Henry Talbot a/k/a Patrick Henry, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of April, 2000, the Commonwealth’s motion to quash the appeal is granted. The appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
755 A.2d 663
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania Acting by Attorney General D. Michael Fisher, Appellee, v. GREATER MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL, INC. and Gerald Payne, Betty Payne, Don Hall, Brenda Hall, Jim List, Patrick Henry Talbert, a/k/a Patrick Henry Talbot a/k/a Patrick Henry, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 19, 2000.
